info.name: OpenAPI Specification for CMS - Doc
info.description:
API Specification document of the CMS system

Contact Support:
 Name: Vishal Prajapati

item.name: Get students belonging to a course

request.description: Returns the list of all students enrolled in the course

response.name: 200 OK
404 Not Found

item.name: Add a student to a course

request.description: Adds a new student association to the course and returns the added student.

response.name: 201 Created
response.body:
{
    "studentId": 103,
    "firstName": "Maria",
    "lastName": "Rodriguez",
    "phoneNumber": "555-555-3333",
    "address": "US"
}

response.name: 400 Bad Request
404 Not Found
200 OK

request.description: Updates a course entry and returns the updated course

response.name: 200 OK

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic

request.description: Removes a course entry from the system

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: 404 Not Found

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
